content: Hi there, I'm looking to reference some child health profiles for pregnancy information in the AU primary care IG, and there are some resources I'm finding difficult to track down. I managed to find an EDB Observation profile (referenced from the EDB Composition, although it doesn't seem to be in the list of Observation profiles), and that profile seems to reference the http://hl7.org/fhir/ch/v1/ValueSet/ncdhc-edb-observation-methods ValueSet for Observation.method, but I can't find that ValueSet anywhere. Any tips?
